description: Pro-Palestinian student groups described the students who have occupied Columbia University's Hamilton Hall since early Tuesday as an "autonomous" subgroup of those involved in the encampment that had overtaken the Ivy League campus' West Lawn.
title: Pro-Palestinian student groups say an autonomous group has occupied Columbia University's Hamilton Hall

description: Columbia University administrators shut down much of the school on Tuesday, upending campus life for virtually all students and staff in the wake of ongoing student protests over the Israel-Hamas war.
title: Columbia's near-total lockdown over protests called extreme and divisive by students and staff

description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken continues his diplomatic push for a temporary cease-fire agreement between Israel and Hamas. NBC News International Correspondent Raf Sanchez reports from Tel Aviv.
title: Cease-fire talks made ‘more complicated’ as Israel vows to move ahead with Rafah offensive

description: The tumult at Columbia University has seized national attention, providing for many young Americans an emotionally fraught introduction to heated student activism.
title: Columbia unrest echoes chaotic campus protest movement of 1968

description: House Republicans vowed to use their powers to put pressure on American universities to protect their Jewish students and crack down on anti-Gaza war protests.
title: Amid campus unrest, Republicans vow to use House powers to protect Jewish students

description: Lidia Stepanivna Lumikovska was eventually picked up by a police unit that specializes in frontline evacuations. “I survived that war,” she said, referring to World War Two, “and I am surviving this war.”
title: 98-year-old Ukrainian woman walks miles in her slippers to escape fighting

description: The Israeli military has released video said to show strikes on Hamas targets in the Gaza Strip. Israel's offensive in Gaza has killed at least 34,488 Palestinians, mostly women and children, according to Gaza’s Health Ministry. Israel blames the high civilian death toll on Hamas because the militants fight from dense residential areas.
title: Israeli military releases video of strikes on Hamas targets

description: Students at Columbia University have filed dueling discrimination complaints as confrontations between pro-Palestinian protesters and counterprotesters continue.
title: Jewish and pro-Palestinian students at Columbia University accuse school officials of discrimination in competing complaints
